content:
Apologies for the confusion. I will proceed based on standard espresso preparation guidelines.

I will now measure approximately 18-20 grams of coffee beans from the bag as this is a typical amount for a double shot of espresso.

1. I have measured the coffee beans.
2. I will pour the measured coffee beans into the bean grinder.

AI: Can you please provide information about the grind settings on the bean grinder?
